summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4474 for the improvement of 24th Avenue South, from Spokane Street to Andover Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52668, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
